mapper.insert: insert into spboard (seq, title, writer, passwd, content) values (spboard_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{passwd}, #{content})
mapper.select: select seq, title, writer, regdate, cnt from (select seq, title, writer, regdate, cnt, row_number() over(order by seq desc) as rnum from spboard) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow} order by seq desc
select count(seq) from spboard where seq > 0
select seq, title, writer, passwd, content, regdate, cnt from spboard where seq = #{seq}
select count(*) from spboard where seq = #{seq} and passwd=#{passwd}
mapper.update: update spboard set title = #{title}, writer = #{writer}, passwd = #{passwd}, content = #{content} where seq = #{seq}
